items.status_code:
An integer indicating the result of the request. Acceptable values are:
  • 1:OK
  • 100:Invalid API Key
  • 101:Object Not Found
  • 102:Error in URL Format
  • 103:'jsonp' format requires a 'json_callback' argument
  • 104:Filter Error
  • 105:Subscriber only video is for subscribers only
items.error: A text string representing the status_code
items.number_of_total_results: The number of total results matching the filter conditions specified
items.number_of_page_results: The number of results on this page
items.limit: The value of the limit filter specified, or 100 if not specified
items.offset: The value of the offset filter specified, or 0 if not specified
items.results: Zero or more items that match the filters specified

items.value: URL pointing to the accessory detail resource.
Date the accessory was added to Giant Bomb.
Date the accessory was last updated on Giant Bomb.
Brief summary of the accessory.
Description of the accessory.
For use in single item api call for accessory.
Unique ID of the accessory.
Main image of the accessory.
List of image tags to filter the images endpoint.
Name of the accessory.
URL pointing to the accessory on Giant Bomb.
The data format of the response takes either xml, json, or jsonp.
List of field names to include in the response. Use this if you want to reduce the size of the response payload. This filter canaccept multiple arguments, each delimited with a ","
The number of results to display per page.This value defaults to 100 and can not exceed this number.
Return results starting with the object at the offset specified.
The result set can be sorted by the marked fields in the Fields section below. Format: &sort=field:direction where direction iseither asc or desc.

The result can be filtered by the marked fields in the Fields section below.

Single filter: &filter=field:value
Multiple filters: &filter=field:value,field:value
Date filters: &filter=field:start value|end value (using datetime format)

List of aliases the game is known by. A \n (newline) seperates each alias.
URL pointing to the game detail resource.
Characters related to the game.
Concepts related to the game.
Date the game was added to Giant Bomb.
Date the game was last updated on Giant Bomb.
Brief summary of the game.
Description of the game.
Companies who developed the game.

Expected day of release. The month is represented numerically. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_month', 'expected_release_year' and 'expected_release_quarter' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the game. These fields will be empty if the 'original_release_date' field is set.

Expected month of release. The month is represented numerically. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_quarter' and 'expected_release_year' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the game. These fields will be empty if the 'original_release_date' field is set.

Expected quarter of release. The quarter is represented numerically, where 1 = Q1, 2 = Q2, 3 = Q3, and 4 = Q4. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_month' and 'expected_release_year' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the game.These fields will be empty if the 'original_release_date' field is set.

Expected year of release. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_month' and 'expected_release_quarter' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the game. These fields will be empty if the 'original_release_date' field is set.

Genres that encompass the game.

URL pointing to the release detail resource.
Date the release was added to Giant Bomb.
Date the release was last updated on Giant Bomb.
Brief summary of the release.
Description of the release.
Companies who developed the release.

Expected day of release. The day is represented numerically. Combine with 'expected_release_month', 'expected_release_year' and 'expected_release_quarter' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the release. These fields will be empty if the 'release_date' field is set.

Expected month of release. The month is represented numerically. Combine with 'expected_release_day', expected_release_quarter' and 'expected_release_year' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the release. These fields will be empty if the 'release_date' field is set.

Expected quarter of release. The quarter is represented numerically, where 1 = Q1, 2 = Q2, 3 = Q3, and 4 = Q4. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_month' and 'expected_release_year' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the release.These fields will be empty if the 'release_date' field is set.

Expected year of release. Combine with 'expected_release_day', 'expected_release_month' and 'expected_release_quarter' for Giant Bomb's best guess release date of the game. These fields will be empty if the 'release_date' field is set.

URL pointing to the video detail resource.
Related objects to the video.
Brief summary of the video.
URL to the HD version of the video.
URL to the High Res version of the video.
URL to the Low Res version of the video.

URL for video embed player. To be inserted into an iFrame.
You can add ?autoplay=true to auto-play.
You can add ?time=x where 'x' is an integer between 0 and the length of the video in seconds to start the video at that point.
You can add ?vol=x where 'x' is a decimal between 0 and 1, .75 for example, to set the starting volume.
The above three parameters may be used together. Example: ?time=45&vol=.5&autoplay=true
See http://www.giantbomb.com/api/video-embed-sample/ for more information on using the embed player.
For use in single item api call for video.
